title: Centimeters to Inches
description: Write a program that, given an integer value (centimeters), returns its conversion to inches. 1 inch = 2.54 cm. The value should ALWAYS be rounded upwards (if needed).

title: Palindrome Checker
description: Write a function that checks if a given string is a palindrome.

title: Factorial Calculator
description: Write a function that calculates the factorial of a given number.

title: Sum of Array
description: Write a function that returns the sum of all elements in an array.

title: Reverse a String
description: Write a function that reverses a given string.

title: Fibonacci Sequence
description: Write a function that returns the nth number in the Fibonacci sequence.

title: Prime Number Checker
description: Write a function that checks if a given number is a prime number.

title: Anagram Checker
description: Write a function that checks if two strings are anagrams.

title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
description: Write a function that finds the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

title: Valid Parentheses
description: Write a function that checks if a given string of parentheses is valid.

title: Merge Two Sorted Lists
description: Write a function that merges two sorted linked lists and returns it as a new list.

title: Add Two Numbers
description: Write a function that adds two numbers represented by linked lists.

title: Container With Most Water
description: Write a function that finds the two lines that together with the x-axis forms a container, such that the container contains the most water.

title: Trapping Rain Water
description: Write a function that calculates how much water it can trap after raining.

title: Longest Valid Parentheses
description: Write a function that finds the length of the longest valid parentheses substring.
